H0.text: In which city will the 2020 Summer Olympics be held. Beijing

H1.text: In which city will the 2020 Summer Olympics be held. Seoul

H2.text: In which city will the 2020 Summer Olympics be held. Singapore

H3.text: In which city will the 2020 Summer Olympics be held. 東京

A4.text: Tokyo hosted the 2020 Summer Olympics and Paralympics, which had to be rescheduled to the summer of 2021 due to COVID-19 pandemic.
